SELECT si.id, si.serial_number, si.product_id, si.create_date, pi.`code`, pi.model, pi.`name`, pi.images FROM serial_info si LEFT JOIN product_info pi ON ( si.product_id = pi.id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.serial_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{serialInfo.serialNumber},'%')
AND pi.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{serialInfo.productName},'%')
